title: Bug 121323 - XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: When entering an XPath expression for the column mapping with a selection part like section[@id='left'] in the XML Edit Data Set dialog, the selection is stripped off and stored in the filterInfo HashMap. However, when leaving the dialog, the RelationInformation gets persisted to .rptdesign, but the data stored in filterInfo is lost.
EB: The filter information should persist in the RelationInformation when leaving the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog. 2. Enter an XPath expression for the column mapping with a selection part. 3. Leave the dialog. Observation: The data stored in the filterInfo HashMap is lost when leaving the dialog.
